mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY r.REVIEW_ID) AS NUM, p.PRODUCT_ID, r.REVIEW_ID, o.ORDER_NUMBER, r.REVIEW_STATUS, p.PRODUCT_NAME, r.REVIEW_CONTENTS, u.USER_EMAIL, u.USER_NAME, r.REVIEW_CREATED_AT FROM review r JOIN product p ON r.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID JOIN user u ON r.USER_ID_NO = u.USER_ID_NO JOIN orders o ON r.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID;
SELECT r.REVIEW_ID, u.USER_NAME, r.REVIEW_CONTENTS, r.REVIEW_CREATED_AT FROM review r JOIN user u ON r.USER_ID_NO = u.USER_ID_NO WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review) AS totalReviewCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE REVIEW_STATUS = '답변완료') AS completedRepliedCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE REVIEW_STATUS = '미답변') AS notRepliedCount;
